issue.title: [CI][Docs] Exercise documentation builds on the main branch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14505](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14505). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We regularly have documentation build issues since the build has been disabled on github actions.
